channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 17:31 Repulse of the alarm in the city. Kyiv. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 17:31 Repulse of the alarm in the city. Kyiv. Stay tuned for further messages. #m_Kyiv This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.
